00042 // see below for places where serial port is read
00043 // and needs replacement for parallel port hookup
00044 
00045 #include <keyer.h>
00046 
00047 //========================================================================
00048 // nothing affected by physical port connection here
00049 
00050 BOOLEAN klogic( KeyerLogic kl, BOOLEAN dit, BOOLEAN dah, REAL wpm,
00051                 int iambicmode, BOOLEAN midelementmodeB, BOOLEAN ditmemory,
00052                 BOOLEAN dahmemory, BOOLEAN autocharspacing,
00053                 BOOLEAN autowordspacing, int weight, REAL ticklen )
00054 {
00055 
00056     REAL ditlen = 1200 / wpm;
00057     int set_element_timeouts = NO_TIMEOUTS_SCHED;
00058 
00059     /* Do we need to initialize the keyer? */
00060     if ( !kl->flag.init )
00061     {
00062         kl->flag.prev.dit = dit;
00063         kl->flag.prev.dah = dah;
00064         kl->element.last = kl->element.curr = NO_ELEMENT;
00065         kl->element.iamb = NO_PADDLE_SQUEEZE;
00066         kl->element.psqam = 0;
00067         kl->element.invtd = 0;
00068         kl->timeout.midl = kl->timeout.beep = kl->timeout.elem = 0;
00069         kl->timeout.dlay = 0;
00070         kl->dlay_type = NO_DELAY;
00071         kl->flag.init = 1;
00072     }
00073 
00074     /* Decrement the timeouts */
00075     kl->timeout.dlay -= kl->timeout.dlay > 0 ? ticklen : 0;
00076     if ( kl->timeout.dlay <= 0 )
00077     {
00078         /* If nothing is scheduled to play, and we just did a character
00079            spacing delay, and we do auto word spacing, wait for a word
00080            spacing delay, otherwise resume the normal element timeout
00081            countdowns */
00082         if ( kl->timeout.elem <= 0 && kl->dlay_type == CHAR_SPACING_DELAY &&
00083              autowordspacing )
00084         {
00085             kl->timeout.dlay = ditlen * 4;
00086             kl->dlay_type = WORD_SPACING_DELAY;
00087         }
00088         else
00089         {
00090             kl->dlay_type = NO_DELAY;
00091             kl->timeout.midl -= kl->timeout.midl > 0 ? ticklen : 0;
00092             kl->timeout.beep -= kl->timeout.beep > 0 ? ticklen : 0;
00093             kl->timeout.elem -= kl->timeout.elem > 0 ? ticklen : 0;
00094         }
00095     }
00096 
00097     /* Are both paddles squeezed? */
00098     if ( dit && dah )
00099     {
00100         kl->element.iamb = PADDLES_SQUEEZED;
00101 
00102         /* Are the paddles squeezed past the middle of the element? */
00103         if ( kl->timeout.midl <= 0 )
00104             kl->element.psqam = 1;
00105     }
00106     else
00107         /* Are both paddles released and we had gotten a squeeze in this element? */
00108     if ( !dit && !dah && kl->element.iamb == PADDLES_SQUEEZED )
00109         kl->element.iamb = PADDLES_RELEASED;
00110 
00111     /* Is the current element finished? */
00112     if ( kl->timeout.elem <= 0 && kl->element.curr != NO_ELEMENT )
00113     {
00114         kl->element.last = kl->element.curr;
00115 
00116         /* Should we insert an inverted element? */
00117         if ( ( ( dit && dah ) ||
00118                ( kl->element.invtd && kl->element.iamb != PADDLES_RELEASED )
00119                || ( kl->element.iamb == PADDLES_RELEASED &&
00120                     iambicmode == MODE_B && ( !midelementmodeB ||
00121                                               kl->element.psqam ) ) ) )
00122         {
00123             if ( kl->element.last == DAH )
00124                 set_element_timeouts = kl->element.curr = DIT;
00125             else
00126                 set_element_timeouts = kl->element.curr = DAH;
00127         }
00128         else
00129         {
00130             /* No more element */
00131             kl->element.curr = NO_ELEMENT;
00132 
00133             /* Do we do automatic character spacing? */
00134             if ( autocharspacing && !dit && !dah )
00135             {
00136                 kl->timeout.dlay = ditlen * 2;
00137                 kl->dlay_type = CHAR_SPACING_DELAY;
00138             }
00139         }
00140 
00141         kl->element.invtd = 0;
00142         kl->element.iamb = NO_PADDLE_SQUEEZE;
00143         kl->element.psqam = 0;
00144     }
00145 
00146     /* Is an element currently being played? */
00147     if ( kl->element.curr == NO_ELEMENT )
00148     {
00149         if ( dah )              /* Dah paddle down ? */
00150             set_element_timeouts = kl->element.curr = DAH;
00151         else if ( dit )         /* Dit paddle down ? */
00152             set_element_timeouts = kl->element.curr = DIT;
00153     }
00154 
00155     /* Do the dah memory */
00156     if ( kl->element.curr == DIT && !kl->flag.prev.dah && dah && dahmemory )
00157         kl->element.invtd = 1;
00158 
00159     /* Do the dit memory */
00160     if ( kl->element.curr == DAH && !kl->flag.prev.dit && dit && ditmemory )
00161         kl->element.invtd = 1;
00162 
00163     /* If we had a dit (or dah) scheduled to be played after a delay,
00164        and the operator lifted both paddles before the end of the delay,
00165        and we have no dit (or dah) memory, forget it */
00166 
00167     if ( kl->timeout.dlay > 0 && !dit && !dah &&
00168          ( ( kl->element.curr == DIT && !ditmemory ) ||
00169            ( kl->element.curr == DAH && !dahmemory ) ) )
00170         set_element_timeouts = kl->element.curr = NO_ELEMENT;
00171 
00172     /* Do we need to set the playing timeouts of an element? */
00173     switch ( set_element_timeouts )
00174     {
00175     case NO_ELEMENT:           /* Cancel any dit or dah */
00176         kl->timeout.beep = 0;
00177         kl->timeout.midl = 0;
00178         kl->timeout.elem = 0;
00179         break;
00180 
00181     case DIT:                  /* Schedule a dit? */
00182         kl->timeout.beep = ( ditlen * ( REAL ) weight ) / 50;
00183         kl->timeout.midl = kl->timeout.beep / 2;
00184         kl->timeout.elem = ditlen * 2;
00185         break;
00186 
00187     case DAH:                  /* Schedule a dah? */
00188         kl->timeout.beep = ( ditlen * ( REAL ) weight ) / 50 + ditlen * 2;
00189         kl->timeout.midl = kl->timeout.beep / 2;
00190         kl->timeout.elem = ditlen * 4;
00191         break;
00192     }
00193 
00194     kl->flag.prev.dit = dit;
00195     kl->flag.prev.dah = dah;
00196 
00197     return kl->timeout.beep > 0 && kl->timeout.dlay <= 0;
00198 }
00199 
00200 KeyerState newKeyerState( void )
00201 {
00202     return ( KeyerState ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( KeyerStateInfo ),
00203                                      "newKeyerState" );
00204 }
00205 
00206 void delKeyerState( KeyerState ks )
00207 {
00208     safefree( ( char * ) ks );
00209 }
00210 
00211 KeyerLogic newKeyerLogic( void )
00212 {
00213     return ( KeyerLogic ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( KeyerLogicInfo ),
00214                                      "newKeyerLogic" );
00215 }
00216 
00217 void delKeyerLogic( KeyerLogic kl )
00218 {
00219     safefree( ( char * ) kl );
00220 }
